# MPPAW Member Survey: Shaping Our Future Direction

## Introduction

MPPAW is at a crossroads. We're evaluating our programming and structure to determine if there is a viable path to increase member engagement. Your input will directly shape our priorities for the coming year. This survey should take about 10 minutes to complete.

```{r}
sd_next(label="Begin Survey")
```

:::

::: {.sd_page}

### Current Engagement & Value {{< iconify streamline-color:heart-rate-pulse-graph >}}: 

```{r}
sd_question(
  type  = 'mc',
  id    = 'engage1',
  label = "How would you describe your current level of engagement with MPPAW?",
  option = c(
    'Very active (attend most events, volunteer regularly)'    = "very",
    'Moderately active (attend some events, occasional volunteering)' = "moderately",
    'Minimally active (attend rarely, no volunteering)'        = "minimally",
    'Not currently active but interested in re-engaging'       = "interested",
    'Not currently active and unlikely to re-engage'           = "unlikely"
  )
)
```

```{r}
sd_question(
  type  = 'mc_multiple',
  id    = 'engage2',
  label = "What initially motivated you to join MPPAW? (Select all that apply)",
  option = c(
    'Professional networking'                 = "networking",
    'Learning from expert speakers'           = "learning",
    'Career development opportunities'        = "development",
    'Mentorship (giving or receiving)'        = "mentorship",
    'Contributing to the applied psychology community'           = "contributing",
    'Student/early career support'            = "students",
    'Other'                                   = "other"
  )
)

# Target question
sd_question(
  type  = "text",
  id    = "engage2_other", 
  label = "Please specify the other motivation:"
)

```

```{r}
sd_question(
  type  = 'mc_multiple',
  id    = 'engage3',
  label = "Which of these factors, if any, have reduced your participation in MPPAW activities? (Select all that apply)",
  option = c(
    'Time constraints/busy schedule'                 = "constraints",
    "Event timing doesn't work for me"           = "timing",
    'Content not relevant to my current needs'        = "content",
    'Prefer online professional communities (LinkedIn, Reddit, etc.)'        = "communities",
    'Geographic distance/location issues'           = "distance",
    'Post-pandemic preference for virtual engagement'            = "covid",
    'Other priorities took precedence'              = "priorities",
    "Events don't provide enough networking opportunity" = "networking",
    'Other'                                   = "other"
  )
)

# Target question
sd_question(
  type  = "text",
  id    = "engage3_other", 
  label = "Please specify the other factor(s):"
)
```

```{r}
sd_next(next_page = 'page2')
```

:::

::: {.sd_page id=page2}

### Mentorship {{< iconify streamline-color:global-learning >}}: 

The next 6 questions all regard the <a href="https://mppaw.org/mentoring" target="_blank">MPPAW mentorship program</a>

```{r}
sd_question(
  type  = 'mc',
  id    = 'mentor1',
  label = "Would you be likely to participate as a *mentor*?",
  option = c(
    "Yes, definitely"                             = "definitely",
    "Yes, possibly depending on time commitment"  = "possibly",
    "No, but I might in the future"               = "future",
    "No"                                          = "no"
  )
)
```

```{r}
sd_question(
  type  = 'mc',
  id    = 'mentor2',
  label = "Would you be likely to participate as a *mentee*?",
  option = c(
    "Yes, definitely"                             = "definitely",
    "Yes, possibly depending on the match"        = "possibly",
    "No, but I might in the future"               = "future",
    "No"                                          = "no"
  )
)
```

```{r}
sd_question(
  type  = 'mc',
  id    = 'mentor3',
  label = "What mentoring time commitment works best for your schedule?",
  option = c(
    "1-3 months"                = "1",
    "3-6 months"                = "3",
    "6-12 months"               = "6",
    "Ongoing/flexible timing"    = "flex"
  )
)
```

```{r}
sd_question(
  type  = 'mc_multiple',
  id    = 'mentor4',
  label = "What mentoring structure do you prefer? (Select all that apply)",
  option = c(
    "One-on-one mentoring"                      = "1",
    "Small group mentoring (3-5 people)"        = "small",
    "Large group mentoring circles (6+ people)" = "large",
    "Peer-to-peer mentoring networks"           = "networks"
  )
)
```

```{r}
sd_question(
  type  = 'mc_multiple',
  id    = 'mentor5',
  label = "What level of mentoring formality works best for you? (Select all that apply)",
  option = c(
    "Structured program with set goals and milestones"        = "structured",
    "Semi-structured with some guidelines but flexibility"    = "semi",
    "Informal relationship-building and advice sharing"       = "informal",
    "Event-based networking opportunities"                    = "event"
  )
)
```

```{r}
sd_question(
  type  = 'mc_multiple',
  id    = 'mentor6',
  label = "What mentoring format(s) would you participate in? (Select all that apply)",
  option = c(
    "Virtual meetings only"                                   = "virtual",
    "In-person meetings only"                                 = "inperson",
    "Hybrid (combination of virtual and in-person)"           = "hybrid",
    "Asynchronous communication (email, messaging platforms)" = "asynch"
  )
)
```

```{r}
sd_next()
```

### Community Contribution & Volunteering {{< iconify streamline-color:city-hall >}}: 

```{r}
sd_question(
  type   = "matrix",
  id     = "contribute1",
  label  = "How interested would you be in contributing to MPPAW in the following ways?",
  row    = c(
    "Helping plan/organize events"          = "organize",
    "Speaking at events or leading workshops"    = "speak",
    "Mentoring other members"               = "mentor",
    "Recruiting new members"                = "recruit",
    "Social media/marketing support"        = "market",
    "Administrative/operational support"    = "admin"
  ),
  option = c(
    "Very interested" = "3",
    "Somewhat interested"  = "2",
    "Not interested"    = "1"
  )
)
```

### Organizational Structure & Membership {{< iconify streamline-color:blood-donate-drop >}}: 

```{r}
sd_question(
  type  = 'mc',
  id    = 'structure1',
  label = "How important is it to you that MPPAW continues to charge membership dues?",
  option = c(
    "Very important - dues ensure commitment and fund activities"   = "4",
    "Somewhat important - reasonable dues are acceptable"           = "3",
    "Not important - prefer free or donation-based model"           = "2",
    "Don't know/no opinion"    = "1"
  )
)
```

```{r}
sd_question(
  type  = 'mc',
  id    = 'structure2',
  label = "Would you support higher membership dues if they enabled significantly enhanced programming and services?",
  option = c(
    "Yes, I would support a substantial increase (50%+ higher) for premium programming"   = "6",
    "Yes, I would support a moderate increase (25-50% higher) for improved programming"           = "5",
    "Yes, I would support a small increase (up to 25% higher) for some enhancements"           = "4",
    "No, I prefer to keep dues at the current level"    = "3",
    "No, I would prefer lower dues even if it means fewer programs" = "2",
    "It depends on what specific enhancements would be offered"  = "1"
  )
)
```

```{r}
sd_question(
  type  = 'mc_multiple',
  id    = 'structure3',
  label = "What types of enhanced programming would justify higher dues to you? (Select all that apply)",
  option = c(
    "Higher-caliber speakers and events (e.g., speaker compensation and travel)"   = "caliber",
    "More frequent programming"               = "frequent",
    "Professional development workshops"      = "workshops",
    "Enhanced networking opportunities"       = "network",
    "Better venues and catering"              = "venues",
    "Additional member services (career resources, online platform, etc.)"  = "services",
    "Scholarships or subsidies for members"         = "subsidies",
    "Other"                                      = "other"
  )
)

# Target question
sd_question(
  type  = "text",
  id    = "structure3_other", 
  label = "Please specify the other type of enhanced programming:"
)
```

```{r}
sd_question(
  type  = 'mc',
  id    = 'structure4',
  label = "What would you **most** like to give back to the applied psychology community through MPPAW?",
  option = c(
    "Share my professional expertise"               = "share",
    "Support students/early career professionals"   = "support",
    "Help build professional networks"              = "build",
    "Advance the field through research/practice sharing"    = "advance",
    "Create inclusive opportunities for underrepresented groups" = "inclusive",
    "Advocate for the profession"  = "advocate",
    "Other" = "other"
  )
)

# Target question
sd_question(
  type  = "text",
  id    = "structure4_other", 
  label = "Please specify what other way you would like to give back:"
)
```

```{r}
sd_next()
```
